rules.title: Follow Discord's Terms of Service
rules.description:
Please ensure that you're following Discord's Terms of Service while talking in this server. 
https://discord.com/terms & https://discord.com/guidelines

rules.title: Keep the Server SFW
rules.description: Make sure whatever you post is appropriate for those who are 13 and over.

rules.title: No hate speech or harassment of any kind
rules.description: This is self explanatory, but hate speech, and threats are not allowed on this server.  We do not tolerate it and if you're caught breaking this rule, you'll be banned immediately

rules.title: No Controversial Topics
rules.description: This is a CODING RELATED server. Please have those somewhere else.

rules.title: No offensive slurs or languages that could be triggering to people in the community
rules.description: Self explanatory, if caught breaking this, immediate ban.

rules.title: Keep spam + promotion out
rules.description:
Spamming of any kind is prohibited in this server. For example, mass-ping or bot spam or text-walls.
Promoting anywhere other than promotion is not allowed. Also, no unrequested Direct Messages (DM) Promotion.

rules.title: Use proper channels for discussion, please.
rules.description: Self explanatory, there's place for everything. For example, ask for help in discord-bot-help or off topic conversations or arguments(NOT FIGHTS) in main-chat

rules.title: DM-ing moderators for help
rules.description: Please don't DM moderators for help, they have their DM open for server regarding problem not for your discord bot help, doing so will get you kicked so beware.
